title.en: Research Process and Methods in Folkloristics

structural_unit_name.en: Department of Estonian and Comparative Folklore

name.en: Department of Estonian and Comparative Folklore

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: Development of folkloristic research methods in the context of changing scientific paradigms will be analysed. The course focuses on the characteristics of Estonian folkloristics conditioned by the geographical and cultural location of Estonia as well as by its openness to dialogues with contradictory research traditions. The design of the research language, the special features of the research stages and the types of feedback are examined.
description.et: Analüüsitakse folkloristlike meetodite kujunemist teadusparadigmade muutumise kontekstis. Keskendutakse eesti folkloristika eripärale, mis on tingitud Eesti geograafilisest ja kultuurilisest naabrusest ning dialoogivalmidusest vastandlike teadustraditsioonidega. Vaadeldakse teaduskeele kujunemist/kujundamist, teadusetappide erijooni ja tagasiside liike.

objectives.en: Observation of scholarly texts from three perspective:
1) method-centred analysis of the existing texts
objectives.et: 1) folkloristike uurimismeetodite kujunemine, lähtudes teoreetilisest raamist ja selle muutumisest

objectives.en: 2) composing texts and analysing of the academic language
objectives.et: 2) teaduskeele seos uurimismeetodite ja teoreetilise tagapõhjaga

objectives.en: 3) presentation of research, compilation of feedback

learning_outcomes.en: 1) Skill to explain the formation of folkloristic research methods and scientific language, and interpret the academic texts from this perspective
learning_outcomes.et: 1) oskus mõtestada folkloristlike uurimismeetodite ja teaduskeele kujunemist teadusajaloolises kontekstis

learning_outcomes.en: 2) Skill of analysing the different stages of a scientific work from the methodological/theoretical perspective
learning_outcomes.et: 2) oskus kirjeldada ja mõtestada uurimisprotsessi erinevaid etappe, pidades silmas osa ja terviku omavahelisi seoseid

learning_outcomes.en: 3) Ability to compile various feedback genres
learning_outcomes.et: 3) oskus eristada tagasiside liike (retsensioon, oponeering, ülevaade-tutvustus) ja oskus neid koostada
